name: Pink, Ivory, Gold, Lace Fabric Flower wedding Bouquet & Boutonniere
description:
"Pink Romance" - featured in Emmaline Bride's blog post titled 20 Amazing Fake Flower Bouquets - & is so lovely & elegant! 

Keep your bouquet long after your wedding day!
I spent hours on this piece, adding so many little details & ribbon roses, that it is hard to capture in pictures. Features pink, rosy mauve, antique white, ivory, tan & fuchsia double faced satin ribbon. Accented with luxe ivory wired "quilted" ribbon, ivory lace, burlap, pearls, pink tulle and two gorgeously sparkling gold rhinestone brooches. Very classy look! Is light weight and measures about 27" round / 13' top to bottom / 9" across. Handle is 8". Comes in a black organza bag for safe keeping. 

Along with this one of a kind bouquet is a matching boutonniere for your groom on a pin back. Measures about 3" across (at widest points).

name: Burlap & White Lace sash / belt
description: Simply rustic & perfectly pretty dress sash of soft natural jute and lace ribbons for a bride or bridesmaids. Measures 1 1/2" in width and 6' feet in length - giving you room to tie into a knot or small bow. Longer length available.
